verbs.description: During the first formal episode of CNN ’s Cuomo Prime Time ( [V: following] [ARG2: two trial runs] ) , host Chris Cuomo engaged in a lengthy back and forth with former New York City Mayor Rudy Giuliani , now a member of President Trump 's legal team . Part of that discussion focused on Trump ’s pardons of Dinesh D'Souza , Scooter Libby , and Joe Arpaio and his potential pardon of Martha Stewart .
